entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Command `dotnet publish ... returned a non-zero code: 1` without explanation #67517
  • JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties ignores collections #67514
  • Runtime error with System.Native : Unable to load shared library 'System.Native' or one of its dependencies. #67510
  • timeout in ZeroByteRead_IssuesZeroByteReadOnUnderlyingStream #67509
  • LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests failing regularly with FatalProtocolException #67508
  • .Net 6. Running processes as separate tasks increases the execution time drastically #67506
  • Confusing message on Http timeout #67505
  • Vector<T>.Zero.Equals(vec) produces less ideal code than vec == Vector<T>.Zero #67500

Closed

  • [arm64] Addressing mode for vectors #67435
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #67217
  • what files make up the runtime? #67504
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_NotepadWithContent_withArgumentList(useShellExecute: True) #67408
  • net6.0-maccatalyst not compatible with c#9 #67497
  • Bhaderkali #67498
  • Accessing an array of ValueTuple<int[], int, ...> throws exception if code is optimized #66254
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Align nodes when `!SupportsRelativePointers` #67516
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP: Optimize performance of copying native test components #67515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup unused code and remove sparc and mips architectures #67503
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Consistently use AssemblyName in execution script generator #67449
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow null-based `ARR_ADDR`s #67486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` on x86 #67335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD #67490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup fp registers assignments from arm64 path #65629
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Tests for altered references for SignedXml #67501
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Skip check of Notepad title on Win 11 #67495
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Cleanup legacy interop in System.Security.Principal.Windows #67479
    area-System.Security
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the generic math interfaces according to the last API review #67453
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the cost of adding many unnamed parameters to an OdbcCommand. #66869
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • Handle final elements in SpanHelpers.Contains for byte and char vectorized #67492
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0161 should be self-sufficient and documented #60546

Closed

  • Getting Issue With ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider, Crashing With InvalidCastException #32070
    Backlog
  • Multiple Parameter Null Checks in `Func` Causes Compiler Error #60547
  • Confusing error from compiler around lambda with bad body #613
    Backlog
  • Create Roslyn Diagnostic Analyzer that makes sure SupportedDiagnostics are used only in one place #294
    Backlog
  • Adding a parameter quick-fix #805
    Backlog
  • Missing Generic Type Parameter shows quick fix for redundant namespace #81
    Backlog
  • SemanticModel.GetArgumentInfo API needed to retrieve the IParameterSymbol that an ArgumentSyntax binds to #9
    Backlog
  • when input is dynamic the compiler infers the output as dynamic #60527

PullRequests

Created

  • Move formatting analyzer to `Analyzers` layer #60549
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete unused files in CodeStyle layer #60548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Listview Viewcell Context Actions aren't bound to the datatemplates viewmodel #5783
  • Cant debug on real Android API 21 Device #5782
  • App crashes when installed from apk, works from debugger #5781
  • Platform-specific CSS styling #5780
  • Folder YOUR_APP.exe.WebView2 is always created by BlazorWebView #5779
  • No Maui Project Template and error: Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #5778

Closed

  • [Bug] [WinUI] [Essentials] When calling MainThread, System.InvalidOperationException: 'Unable to find main thread.' #2451
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BlazorWebViewHandler.Android.cs #5777

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
